description: The fuel gauge is almost on empty and you need a gas station, fast.  Only problem is you don't know where the nearest gas station is.   With Nearest Gas Station USA, just tap "Find Nearest Gas Station" and get the 10 service stations nearest your location at the time of the inquiry.  Tap one of the gas stations on the list and get the directions to that station from your current position.  This app is a life-saver and a definite must have, especially for people who travel on the road!
